attributes.Title: ST- Catalan Youtube
attributes.Description:
Spring
2016
Catalan
397T
UMass Amherst
Survey of modern Catalan popular culture through youtube videos, short films, documentaries, and short stories. This course will be a good chance not only to discuss Catalan film, language and literature, but also to widen our perception and knowledge on modern Peninsular cultures. All films and videos shown in their original versions with English subtitles; readings in English, or Spanish and Catalan for capable students.
Oral presentations and assignments can be written in English, Spanish or Catalan.
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
70405

attributes.Title: Elementary Catalan I
attributes.Description:
Fall
2015
Catalan
110
UMass Amherst
This course is an introduction to Catalan for students with no prior knowledge of the language. Through a task-based, communicative approach, this course seeks to initiate students into the elements of reading, writing, listening, and speaking in Catalan.
Open to All.
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
38487

attributes.Title: Elementary Catalan II
attributes.Description:
Spring
2016
Catalan
120
UMass Amherst
This course is conceived to enable students to acquire the elementary notions of the Catalan language (intermediate level) through task-based daily communicative situations. The course's practical nature will promote both the apprentice's participation and interaction in order to facilitate communication in different socio-cultural contexts. This course will develop the student?s capacity focused on the student's individuality in order to achieve a progressive mastery of the four main skills: reading, writing, listening and speaking through real life situations and the creation of a personal project.
Catalan 110
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
68690

attributes.Title: Advanced Intermediate Catalan
attributes.Description:
Spring
2015
Catalan
311
UMass Amherst
Advanced intermediate Catalan with emphasis on written and oral expression. Completion of Catalan 246 or an intermediate knowledge of another Romance language is required. The class will be taught entirely in Catalan.
CATALAN 246
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
19076

attributes.Title: Intensive Intermediate Catalan
attributes.Description:
Fall
2015
Catalan
246
UMass Amherst
This course aims, from a communicative perspective, to develop in an integrated and meaningful way the fundamental linguistic skills of listening and reading comprehension, and oral and written expression of the Catalan language. Furthermore, emphasis will be placed on lexical and grammatical content always seeking to respond to the communicative and academic needs of the student. Completion of Catalan 120 or an intermediate knowledge of another Romance language is required.
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
38481

attributes.Title: Catalan Culture
attributes.Description:
Spring
2016
Catalan
321
UMass Amherst
Survey of modern Catalan culture including its language, literature, art, music, and traditions. Students should have some knowledge of the Catalan or Spanish language. The class will be mainly conducted in Spanish and Catalan, and the readings will be mainly in English. The assignments can be written in English, Spanish or Catalan.
Students should have some elementary knowledge of the Catalan or Spanish language (or an intermediate knowledge of another romance language such as Portuguese, Italian or French).
Permission is required for interchange registration during the add/drop period only.
68689
